title: isaiyil sangatigaL migavum
sahitya:
isaiyil sangatigal migavum uNDadil isaindu kalandAl sadgatiyuNDu


anupallavi

  asaiyAdanavilum innisaiyuNDu saivadanai koNDu miLirum isaiyE


caraNam    pasi tanai marakka sheivadisaiyE piNi tanai tIrppadum nallisaiyE
pasEl ena payir vaLarum isaiyE accam nIkkiDum muraLiyin isaiyE
